GR13sivmstau:0: mahimnaḥ pāraṃ te paramaviduṣo yady asadṛśī stutir brahmādīnām api tadavasannās tvayi giraḥ
GR13sivmstau:2: mamā7py eṣa stotre hara nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ || Smst_1
GR13sivmstau:3: atītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayor atadvyāvṛttyā yaṃ cakitam abhidhatte śrutir api
GR13sivmstau:4: sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ pade tv arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ || Smst_2
GR13sivmstau:5: madhusphītā vācaḥ paramam amṛtaṃ nirmitavatas tava brahman kiṃ vāg api suraguror vismayapadam
GR13sivmstau:6: mama tv etāṃ vāṇīṃ guṇakathanapuṇyena bhavataḥ |
GR13sivmstau:7: punāmī7ty arthe 'smin puramathana buddhir vyavasitā || Smst_3
GR13sivmstau:10: abhavyānām asmin varada ramaṇīyām aramaṇīṃ vihantuṃ vyākrośīṃ vidadhata ihai7ke jaḍadhiyaḥ || Smst_4
GR13sivmstau:11: kimīhaḥ kiṃkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyas tribhuvanaṃ kimādhāro dhātā sṛjati kimupādāna iti ca |
GR13sivmstau:12: atarkyaiśvarye tvayy anavasaraduḥstho hatadhiyaḥ kutarko 'yaṃ kāṃścin mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ || Smst_5
GR13sivmstau:13: ajanmāno lokāḥ kim avayavavanto 'pi jagatām adhiṣṭhātāraṃ kiṃ bhavavidhir anādṛtya bhavati
GR13sivmstau:14: anīśo vā kuryād bhuvanajanane kaḥ parikaro yato mandās tvāṃ praty amaravara saṃśerata ime || Smst_6
GR13sivmstau:15: trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavam iti prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca |
GR13sivmstau:16: rucīnāṃ vaicitryād ṛjukuṭilanānāpathajuṣāṃ nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasām arṇava iva ||
GR13sivmstau:17: mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśur ajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ kapālaṃ ce7tī7yat tava varada tantropakaraṇam
GR13sivmstau:18: surās tāṃ tām ṛddhiṃ dadhati tu bhavadbhrūpraṇihitāṃ na hi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati || Smst_8
GR13sivmstau:19: dhruvaṃ kaścit sarvaṃ sakalam aparas tv adhruvam idaṃ paro dhrauvyādhrauvye jagati gadati vyastaviṣaye |
GR13sivmstau:20: samaste 'py etasmin puramathana tair vismita iva stuvañ jihremi tvāṃ na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā || Smst_9
GR13sivmstau:21: tavai8śvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adhaḥ
GR13sivmstau:23: tato bhaktiśraddhābharagurugṛṇadbhyāṃ giriśa yat svayaṃ tasthe tābhyāṃ tava kim anuvṛttir na phalati || Smst_10
GR13sivmstau:24: ayatnād āpādya tribhuvanam avairavyatikaraṃ daśāsyo yad bāhūn abhṛta raṇakaṇḍūparavaśān |
GR13sivmstau:25: śiraḥpadmaśreṇīracitacaraṇāmbhoruhabaleḥ sthirāyās tvadbhaktes tripurahara visphūrjitam idam amuṣya tvatsevāsamadhigatasāraṃ bhujavanaṃ balāt kailāse 'pi tvadadhivasatau vikramayataḥ
GR13sivmstau:26: alabhyā pātāle 'py alasacalitāṅguṣṭhaśirasi pratiṣṭhā tvayy āsīd dhruvam upacito muhyati khalaḥ yadṛddhiṃ sutrāmṇo varada paramoccair api satīm adhaś cakre bāṇaḥ parijanavidheyatribhuvanaḥ
GR13sivmstau:27: na tac citraṃ tasmin varivasitari tvaccaraṇayor na kasyā unnatyai bhavati śirasas tvayy avanatiḥ akāṇḍabrahmāṇḍakṣayacakitadevāsurakṛpā-
GR13sivmstau:29: na kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho vikāro 'pi ślāghyo bhuvananbhayabhaṅgavyasaninaḥ asiddhārthā nai7va kvacid api sadevāsuranare
GR13sivmstau:30: nivartante nityaṃ jagati jayino yasya viśikhāḥ |
GR13sivmstau:31: sa paśyan īśa tvām itarasurasādhāraṇam abhūt smaraḥ smartavyātmā na hi vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ mahī pādāghātād vrajati sahasā saṃśayapadaṃ padaṃ viṣṇor bhrāmyadbhujaparigharugṇagrahagaṇam
GR13sivmstau:32: muhur dyaur dauḥsthyaṃ yāty anibhṛtajaṭātāḍitataṭā jagadrakṣāyai tvaṃ naṭasi nanu vāmai9va vibhutā || Smst_16
GR13sivmstau:33: viyadvyāpī tārāgaṇaguṇitaphenodgamaruciḥ pravāho vārāṃ yaḥ pṛṣ.atalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te |
GR13sivmstau:34: jagad dvīpākāraṃ jaladhivalayaṃ tena kṛtam ity
GR13sivmstau:35: anenai7vo7nneyaṃ dhṛtamahima divyaṃ tava vapuḥ || Smst_17
GR13sivmstau:36: rathaḥ kṣoṇī yantā śatadhṛtir agendro dhanur atho rathāṅge candrārkau rathacaraṇapāṇiḥ śara iti |
GR13sivmstau:37: didhakṣos te ko 'yaṃ tripuratṛṇam āḍambaravidhir vidheyaiḥ krīḍantyo na khalu paratantrāḥ prabhudhiyaḥ || Smst_18
GR13sivmstau:38: haris te sāhasraṃ kamalabalim ādhāya padayor yad ekone tasmin nijam udaharan netrakamalam
GR13sivmstau:39: gato bhaktyudrekaḥ pariṇatim asau cakravapuṣā trayāṇāṃ rakṣāyai tripurahara jāgarti jagatām kratau supte jāgrat tvam asi phalayoge kratumatāṃ kva karma pradhvastaṃ palati puruṣārādhanam ṛte |
GR13sivmstau:40: atas tvāṃ samprekṣya tratuṣu phaladānapratibhuvaṃ śrutau śraddhāṃ baddhvā dṛḍhaparikaraḥ karmasu janaḥ || Smst_20
GR13sivmstau:41: kriyādakṣo dakṣaḥ kratupatir adhīśas tanubhṛtām ṛṣīṇām ārtvijyaṃ śaraṇada sadasyāḥ suragaṇāḥ
GR13sivmstau:42: kratubhraṃśas tvattaḥ kratuphalavidhānavyasanino dhruvaṃ kartuḥ śraddhāvidhuram abhicārāya hi makhāḥ || Smst_21
GR13sivmstau:43: prajānāthaṃ prasabham abhikaṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ gataṃ rohidbhūtāṃ riramayiṣum ṛśyasya vapuṣā
GR13sivmstau:44: dhanuṣpāṇer yātaṃ divam api sapatrākṛtam amuṃ trasantaṃ te 'dyā7pi tyajati na mṛgavyādharabhasaḥ svalāvaṇyāśaṃsādhṛtadhanuṣam ahnāya tṛṇavat puraḥ pluṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā puramathana puṣpāyudham api
GR13sivmstau:45: yadi straiṇaṃ yamanirata dehārdhaghaṭanād avaiti tvām addhā bata varada mugdhā yuvatayaḥ ||
GR13sivmstau:46: śmaśāneṣv ākrīḍā smarahara piśācāḥ sahacarāś citābhasmālepaḥ srag api nṛkaroṭīparikaraḥ |
GR13sivmstau:47: amāṅgalyaṃ śīlaṃ tava bhavatu nāmai7vam akhilaṃ
GR13sivmstau:48: tathā9pi smart.Rṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalam asi || Smst_24
GR13sivmstau:52: dadhaty antas tattvaṃ kim api yaminas tat kila bhavān || Smst_25
GR13sivmstau:53: tvam arkas tvaṃ somas tvam asi pavanas tvaṃ hutavahas tvam āpas tvaṃ vyoma tvam u dharaṇir ātmā tvam iti ca |
GR13sivmstau:54: paricchinnām evaṃ tvayi pariṇatā bibhrati giraṃ na vidmas tat tattvaṃ vayam iha tu yat tvaṃ na bhavasi || Smst_26
GR13sivmstau:55: trayīṃ tisro vṛttīs tribhuvanam atho trīn api surān nakārādyair varṇais tribhir abhidadhat tīrṇavikṛti |
GR13sivmstau:56: turīyaṃ te dhāma dhvanibhir avarundhānam aṇubhiḥ samastaṃ vyastaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇada gṛṇātī7m iti padam || Smst_27
GR13sivmstau:57: bhavaḥ śarvo rudraḥ paśupatir atho7graḥ sahamahāṃs tathā bhīmeśānāv iti yad abhidhānāṣṭakam idam |
GR13sivmstau:58: amuṣmin pratyekaṃ pravicarati deva śrutir api
GR13sivmstau:60: namo nediṣṭhāya priyadava daviṣṭhāya ca namo namaḥ kṣodiṣṭhāya smarahara mahiṣṭhāya ca namaḥ
GR13sivmstau:61: namo varṣiṣṭhāya trinayana yaviṣṭhāya ca namo namaḥ sarvasmai te tad idam iti sarvāya ca namaḥ bahularajase viśvotpattau bhavāya namo namaḥ prabalatamase tatsaṃhāre harāya namo namaḥ |
GR13sivmstau:62: janasukhakṛte sattvotpattau mṛdāya namo namaḥ pramahasi pade nistraiguṇye śivāya namo namaḥ kṛśapariṇati cetaḥ kleśavaśyaṃ kva ce7daṃ
GR13sivmstau:64: iti cakitam anandīkṛtya māṃ bhaktir ādhād varaca caraṇayos te vākyapuṣpopahāram || Smst_31
GR13sivmstau:65: % pariśiṣṭam: Additional verses in all MSS (!!) but not in the inscription
GR13sivmstau:66: asitagirisamaṃ syāt kajjalaṃ sindhupātre surataruvaraśākhā lekhanī patram urvī |
GR13sivmstau:67: likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālaṃ tad api tava guṇānām īśa pāraṃ na yāti || Smst_Add_1
GR13sivmstau:70: sakalaguṇavariṣṭhaḥ puṣpadantābhidhāno ruciram alaghuvṛttaiḥ stotram etac cakāra || Smst_Add_2
GR13sivmstau:71: aharā7har anavadyaṃ dhūrjaṭe stotram etat paṭhati paramabhaktyā śuddhacittaḥ pumān yaḥ |
GR13sivmstau:72: sa bhavati śivaloke rudratulyaḥ sadātmā pracurataradhanāyuḥ putravān kīrtimāṃś ca || Smst_Add_3
GR13sivmstau:73: maheśān nā7paro devo mahimno nā7parā stutiḥ |
GR13sivmstau:74: aghorān nā7paro mantro nā7sti tattvaṃ guroḥ param || Smst_Add_4
GR13sivmstau:75: dīkṣā dānaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ jñānaṃ yāgādikāḥ kriyāḥ |
GR13sivmstau:76: mahimnas tava pāṭhasya kalāṃ nā7rhanti ṣoḍaśīm || Smst_Add_5
GR13sivmstau:80: sa khalu nijamahimno bhraṣṭa evā7sya roṣāt stavanam idam akārṣīd divyadivyaṃ mahimnaḥ || Smst_Add_7
GR13sivmstau:81: suragurum abhipūjya svargamokṣaikahetuṃ paṭhati yadi manuṣyaḥ prāñjalir nā7nyacetāḥ |
GR13sivmstau:82: vrajati śivasamīpaṃ kinnaraiḥ stūyamānaḥ stavanam idam amoghaṃ puṣpadantapraṇītam || Smst_Add_8
GR13sivmstau:84: kaṇṭhasthitena paṭhitena gṛhasthitena samprīṇito bhavati bhūtapatir maheśaḥ || Smst_Add_9
GR13sivmstau:85: apūrvaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ vivasanatanos te vimṛṣatāṃ munīnāṃ dārāṇāṃ samajani sa ko 'py avyatikaraḥ
GR13sivmstau:86: yato bhagne guhye sakṛd api saparyāṃ vidadhatāṃ dhruvaṃ mokṣaṃ līlāṃ kim api puruṣārthaṃ prasavite vapuḥprādurbhāvād anumitam idaṃ janmani purā purāre nai7vā7haṃ kvacid api bhavantaṃ praṇatavān
GR13sivmstau:87: naman muktaḥ sampraty atanur aham agre 'py anatimān maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tad idam aparādhadvayam api || Smst_Add_11
GR13sivmstau:89: arpitā tena deveśaḥ prīyatāṃ me sadāśivaḥ || Smst_Add_12
GR13sivmstau:90: tava tattvaṃ na jānāmi kīdṛśo 'si maheśvara |
GR13sivmstau:91: yādṛśo 'si mahādeva tādṛśāya namo namaḥ || Smst_Add_13
GR13sivmstau:92: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ |
GR13sivmstau:94: kīrtanena hi rudrasya pāpaṃ yāti sahasradhā |
